Name: MELIGO Creator
About the game: MELIGO Creator is The VRM character provides motion capture in three modes: full body, upper body, and face, and a variety of convenience functions for content. Create your own content with 'Meligo Creator', an all-in-one program for virtual creators. We don't use hmd, we only use vive trackers. However, hmd is needed for smooth room setting. 3 motion capture types . Experience various motion capture types of MELIGO using VRM characters. Full body and upper body motion capture using Vive Tracker is possible, and finger tracking is possible using our company's Mollisen Hand. You can capture facial motion with your iPhone without a tracker. However, the expression of the character must be made in advance to make an expression. Equipment requiring motion capture 1. Full body: 6 Vive Trackers 2. Half body: 2~3 Vive trackers (head trackers can be used on iPhone) 3. Head: 1 tracker or iPhone finger tracking . Finger tracking is possible using Mollisen Cast, our company's development product. We will give you a discount coupon when you sign up for a new member on the MELIGO website Interaction Systems . Reaction to sponsorship is possible in conjunction with Twitch and Africa TV. You can throw the object you want by selecting the sponsorship type and amount.
